data.title: Reshmi Ghosh Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Reshmi Ghosh with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Pursued a degree in communicative English at Jogamaya Devi College in Kolkata, India

Won the Miss India Earth title in the Femina Miss India Contest 2002 in Manila, Philippines

Was drawn into the world of modelling by her best friend Diti

Married Siddharth Vasudev, co-actor and on-screen brother (in the serial Shobha Somnath Ki), on February 1, 2013 after having dated him since 2011
